articles.title: Josh Inglis Shines as Australia Stuns England in Champions Trophy Thriller
articles.label: Sports
articles.body:
On February 22, 2025, cricket fans around the world were treated to an absolute spectacle at Gaddafi Stadium in Lahore. The England cricket team took on the Australian men’s cricket team in a Champions Trophy clash that will go down in history as one of the most thrilling ODIs ever played. At the heart of this epic encounter was Josh Inglis, a name now trending everywhere, who played a match-winning knock of 120 not out to guide Australia to a sensational five-wicket victory over England. Let’s dive into the details of this unforgettable Australia vs England live match and break down how it unfolded.

The day started with the toss, and Australia’s stand-in captain Steve Smith made the bold call to bowl first under the Lahore sky. The Gaddafi Stadium pitch report had suggested a flat track, perfect for batting, and with the Lahore weather being clear and warm, it was set to be a high-scoring affair. England, led by Jos Buttler, didn’t disappoint with the bat. Ben Duckett, in particular, stole the show early on, smashing a brilliant 165 runs off 143 balls. His knock included 17 fours and three sixes, making it the highest individual score in Champions Trophy history, surpassing the previous record of 145 by Nathan Astle and Andy Flower. Alongside Duckett, Joe Root chipped in with a steady 68, helping England post a massive 351/8 in their 50 overs. For Australia, Ben Dwarshuis was the pick of the bowlers, grabbing 3 wickets, while Marnus Labuschagne and Adam Zampa picked up two each to keep things somewhat under control.

Chasing 352 was never going to be easy, even for a team as strong as the Australian men’s cricket team. The England cricket team vs Australian men’s cricket team match scorecard showed early trouble for the Aussies. Openers Travis Head and Jake Fraser-McGurk fell quickly, leaving Australia at 113/4. That’s when Josh Inglis stepped up. Coming in at No. 5, Inglis partnered with Alex Carey, and the two turned the game on its head. Carey scored a gritty 69 off 63 balls, while Inglis unleashed a breathtaking array of shots—reverse sweeps, scoops, and towering sixes. Their 146-run stand for the fifth wicket was the backbone of the chase, keeping Australia in the hunt against a formidable England attack featuring Jofra Archer, Mark Wood, and Brydon Carse.

As the AUS vs ENG live score ticked closer to the target, tension gripped fans watching the England vs Australia live stream. With 34 runs needed off the last five overs, Glenn Maxwell joined Inglis at the crease, and the fireworks began. Maxwell, known for his explosive batting, smashed an unbeaten 32 off just 15 balls, including consecutive boundaries off Mark Wood. But it was Inglis who sealed the deal in style. Facing Wood in the 48th over, he whipped a full delivery over deep mid-wicket for a six, finishing unbeaten on 120 off 86 balls. Australia reached 356/5 with 15 balls to spare, pulling off the highest successful chase in Champions Trophy history and the second-highest in Australian ODI cricket.

The England cricket team vs Australian men’s cricket team timeline has seen plenty of classics, but this AUS vs ENG ODI will be remembered for years. Inglis, born in Leeds, England, before moving to Australia as a teenager, called this his finest innings. “It doesn’t matter who it’s against,” he said post-match, brushing off the irony of starring against his birth country. His knock earned him the Player of the Match award, and social media erupted with praise for ‘Josh English’—as some fans playfully dubbed him—trending alongside terms like ‘AUS vs ENG highlights’ and ‘highest score in Champions Trophy.’

England’s Jos Buttler admitted his team was outplayed. “It was a fantastic game. We put up a good score, but Josh Inglis played an amazing innings. The dew made it tough for our bowlers at the end,” he said. Duckett’s 165, though a record-breaker, ended up in vain, overshadowed by Australia’s incredible chase. The ENG vs AUS live score updates had fans on edge, with commentators like Matthew Hayden calling Inglis’s performance “absolutely crazy.”

For those wondering where to watch the Australian men’s cricket team vs England cricket team, the match was broadcast live on Star Sports and Network 18 in India, with streaming available on JioHotstar. Globally, fans tuned into Sky Sports, Fox Sports, and other platforms, making it accessible for anyone following the England-Australia rivalry. The AUS vs ENG Dream11 prediction had favored England slightly due to their strong batting lineup, but Inglis and Maxwell flipped the script.

The Australian men’s cricket team vs England cricket team players showcased their best. Steve Smith, captaining in place of the injured Pat Cummins, anchored the innings briefly with 31, while Marnus Labuschagne’s part-time spin proved handy with the ball. Adam Zampa, despite going for runs, picked up key wickets, and Ben Dwarshuis’s three-for kept England from running away with the game. On the English side, Duckett and Root starred, but their pace attack struggled under the dew-soaked conditions at Gaddafi Stadium.

The Lahore pitch report had promised runs, and it delivered—over 700 of them in 97 overs! The flat surface, combined with a lightning-fast outfield, made it a batsman’s paradise. The Gaddafi Stadium Lahore pitch report had hinted at some help for spinners, but Adil Rashid’s 1/47 was the best England’s bowlers could muster against Australia’s onslaught. The AUS vs ENG toss decision to bowl first paid off for Smith, as the dew aided the chase later.

This England vs Australia Champions Trophy match wasn’t just about the scorecard—it was a testament to Australia’s never-say-die spirit. The Australia-England rivalry, often called ‘ENG AUS’ or ‘AUS v ENG,’ added extra spice, with Inglis emerging as the hero no one saw coming. Fans searching for ‘England vs Australia ODI’ or ‘Australia-England live score’ were glued to their screens as the game swung back and forth.

Looking at the Champions Trophy table, this win puts Australia in a strong position in Group B, while England will need to regroup fast. The England-Australia score of 351/8 vs 356/5 is now etched in cricket lore, with Inglis’s name alongside it. Whether you call it ‘ENG vs AUS,’ ‘AUS vs ENG,’ or simply ‘Australia-England,’ this match was a rollercoaster that reminded us why we love cricket.

For the Australian men’s cricket team, this victory silenced doubters who questioned their form after recent ODI series losses. For England, it’s back to the drawing board after a defeat that stings despite Duckett’s heroics. As we reflect on this Australia vs England live clash, one thing is clear: Josh Inglis has arrived, and his unbeaten 120 will echo through cricket conversations for a long time. From Maxwell’s late blitz to Carey’s steady hand, this was a team effort, but Inglis was the heartbeat. What a day for cricket!

articles.title: NSE Holidays 2025: Plan Your Trading Around These Key Dates
articles.label: Finance
articles.body:
As we step into 2025, the National Stock Exchange (NSE) remains a powerhouse in India’s financial landscape, driving wealth creation for millions. With a market cap soaring past $5 trillion in 2024, it’s no surprise that traders and investors are already buzzing about what this year holds. But before you dive into your trading strategies, there’s one thing you can’t ignore: the NSE holidays 2025 calendar. Knowing these stock market holidays is crucial for planning your moves, avoiding surprises, and staying ahead in the game. Let’s break down the NSE holidays for 2025 and weave in some trending topics—like the New Delhi Marathon 2025 and the Champions Trophy 2025—that are making waves alongside market chatter.

The NSE, India’s largest stock exchange, operates Monday to Friday from 9:15 AM to 3:30 PM, shutting down on weekends and specific holidays. In 2025, expect 14 official trading holidays, plus a special session that’s got everyone talking: Muhurat Trading on Diwali. These market holidays 2025 aren’t just days off—they’re a chance to step back, analyze, and prep for the next big trade. The first holiday kicks off on February 26 for Mahashivratri, a day when traders swap charts for prayers. It’s a quiet start to the year, especially since January 1, 2025, falls on a Wednesday and isn’t a holiday—unlike many global markets that shut down for New Year’s Day.

Speaking of global vibes, the NSE holidays 2025 list reflects India’s unique blend of culture and commerce. Take March, for instance—it’s packed with two biggies: Holi on March 14 and Id-Ul-Fitr (Ramzan Id) on March 31. Holi, the festival of colors, isn’t just trending on Instagram with #Holi2025—it’s a day when the BSE and NSE join the celebrations, leaving trading screens blank. Then there’s Ramzan Id, wrapping up a month of fasting with a market pause. These stock market holidays give traders a breather, much like runners gearing up for the Apollo New Delhi Marathon 2025, which just saw participants like Ram Prakash smash personal bests on February 23. Both events highlight discipline and timing—key for success in trading and marathons alike.

April is where the NSE holidays 2025 calendar gets busy, with three closures: Shri Mahavir Jayanti on April 10, Dr. Baba Saheb Ambedkar Jayanti on April 14, and Good Friday on April 18. It’s a long weekend bonanza, with Good Friday aligning with global markets—a rare crossover. This cluster of market holidays 2025 could shift momentum, especially with the Union Budget presentation set for February 1 (a Saturday trading session). Analysts on X are already speculating how Budget 2025 might sway Nifty 50 stocks, with some linking it to the NSE’s live trading experiment that day. Will it spark a bull run or a correction? Traders will be watching, holiday or not.

Fast forward to May 1, and Maharashtra Day shuts the NSE again. It’s a single holiday, but it’s a nod to Mumbai—the financial hub where the NSE thrives. Then, August brings two more: Independence Day on August 15 and Ganesh Chaturthi on August 27. Independence Day, a Friday, promises a long weekend, perfect for reflecting on India’s economic strides. Ganesh Chaturthi, trending with #GanpatiBappa, blends devotion with market downtime. These NSE holidays aren’t just breaks—they’re cultural markers that shape India’s trading rhythm, much like how the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 is shaping sports buzz. With Australia’s Josh Inglis smashing records against England in Lahore on February 22, cricket fans and traders alike are riding high on adrenaline.

October is the holiday heavyweight, with three NSE holidays 2025: Gandhi Jayanti/Dussehra on October 2, Diwali on October 21, and Diwali Balipratipada on October 22. Gandhi Jayanti, a Thursday, honors the Mahatma with a market closure, while Diwali brings the year’s most anticipated event: Muhurat Trading. Set for October 21 (Tuesday), this one-hour session kicks off the Hindu financial year with optimism. Last year, it saw a Nifty spike—will 2025 follow suit? The NSE hasn’t dropped exact timings yet, but #MuhuratTrading2025 is already trending on X, with traders sharing Dream11-style predictions for market movers. October 22’s Balipratipada extends the festive break, giving investors a chance to digest Diwali gains.

November 5 marks Prakash Gurpurb Sri Guru Nanak Dev Jayanti, a Wednesday holiday steeped in Sikh tradition. It’s a quieter day on the NSE holidays 2025 list, but no less significant. Then, December 25—Christmas—wraps up the year’s stock market holidays. Falling on a Thursday, it’s a global sync-up, with traders worldwide winding down. Unlike the action-packed Champions Trophy 2025, where Australia’s chase of England’s 351/8 stole headlines, Christmas offers a calm close to a rollercoaster year.

Beyond these 14 weekdays, four holidays—Republic Day (January 26), Ram Navami (April 6), Bakri Id (June 7), and Muharram (July 6)—fall on Sundays, sparing the trading week. That leaves about 250 trading days in 2025, minus weekends and holidays. For context, the New Delhi Marathon 2025 saw runners like Keerthi Siddeshwar celebrate personal victories—traders can aim for their own wins by mastering this calendar. Posts on X, like @Ashishkafunda’s heads-up about Mahashivratri, show how the community’s already syncing up with these dates.

Why care about NSE holidays? They’re more than just days off. Settlements get delayed—think cash flow hiccups—and global markets keep humming, sometimes swaying Indian indices. Take Zero Day, Netflix’s buzzy political drama trending with #ZeroDay2025. Its tale of power plays mirrors the market’s own chess game, where timing is everything. Missing a trading day could mean missing a breakout—or dodging a crash. Plus, with Alice Johnson’s appointment as Pardon Czar trending under #CriminalJusticeReform, there’s a vibe of second chances in 2025—maybe the NSE will see some undervalued stocks get theirs too.

For traders, the NSE holidays 2025 list is a roadmap. Pre-open sessions (9:00 AM–9:08 AM) and closing sessions (3:40 PM–4:00 PM) don’t happen on these days, nor do block deals (8:45 AM–9:00 AM and 2:05 PM–2:20 PM). Commodity markets might hum in the evening—like during Mahashivratri—but equity and derivatives stay silent. Platforms like Zerodha and 5paisa will reflect these closures, so plan your SIPs or F&O moves accordingly. Trending topics on X, like #StockMarketHolidays, are lighting up with tips: “Use holidays to study charts,” one user quipped, echoing the hustle of marathon runners training through off-days.

The England vs. Australia Champions Trophy clash—where Ben Duckett’s 165 met Josh Inglis’s 120*—reminds us that timing and grit win big. The NSE holidays 2025 calendar offers that same edge: know when to pause, when to pounce. Whether you’re chasing Nifty highs or a personal best like New Delhi Marathon’s Japanese Ambassador ONO Keiichi, it’s all about strategy. So, mark February 26, October 21, and every date in between—2025’s market story starts with these holidays. What’s your play?

articles.body:

articles.title: आज का मौसम: दिल्ली में तापमान, बारिश और अपडेटेड वेदर फोरकास्ट
articles.label: Weather
articles.body:
आज का मौसम दिल्ली में कुछ बदलता नजर आ रहा है। मौसम विभाग की रिपोर्ट के अनुसार, aaj ka mosam कैसा रहेगा, इसका पता लगाने के लिए अपडेटेड वेदर फोरकास्ट जारी किया गया है। दिल्ली में आज का मौसम मध्यम तापमान के साथ उमस भरा है और बारिश की संभावना भी बनी हुई है। क्या आज बारिश होगी? मौसम का हाल बताता है कि सुबह हल्की बूँदाबाँदी हो सकती है, जबकि दोपहर के बाद तापमान में थोड़ा उतार-चढ़ाव देखने को मिल सकता है।

मौसम विभाग तापमान और बारिश की जानकारी के अनुसार, आज बारिश होगी या नहीं, यह जानना सभी के लिए महत्वपूर्ण है। delhi weather अपडेट्स के अनुसार, अगर आप बाहर जाने का प्लान बना रहे हैं, तो आपको सावधानी बरतनी चाहिए। वेदर फोरकास्ट बताता है कि कल का मौसम भी बदल सकता है, जिससे aaj mausam kaisa rahega इसका अंदाजा लगाना थोड़ा मुश्किल हो सकता है।

आज का मौसम कैसा है, इस बारे में जानने के लिए लोग अक्सर "आज का मौसम" और "मौसम विभाग तापमान बारिश" जैसे कीवर्ड्स का उपयोग करते हैं। मौसम का हाल और बारिश कब होगी, इसके बारे में ताजा जानकारी प्राप्त करने के लिए "weather" और "rain" से जुड़े अपडेट्स भी बहुत महत्वपूर्ण हैं।

इस बीच, "कल का मौसम" और "कल मौसम कैसा रहेगा?" जैसे प्रश्न भी अक्सर पूछे जाते हैं। मौसम विभाग ने स्पष्ट किया है कि आने वाले दिनों में मौसम में थोड़े बहुत बदलाव की संभावना है, इसलिए समय-समय पर वेदर अपडेट चेक करते रहें।

कुल मिलाकर, आज का मौसम दिल्ली में मिश्रित अनुभव देगा, जिसमें कभी-कभी हल्की बारिश और कभी-कभी तापमान में वृद्धि देखने को मिलेगी। अगर आप बाहर जाने का विचार कर रहे हैं, तो अपने साथ छाता जरूर रखें और मौसम की नवीनतम जानकारी के अनुसार अपनी योजनाएं बनाएं।

articles.title: Afghanistan National Cricket Team vs Australian Men’s Cricket Team: Match Scorecard and Analysis
articles.label: Sports
articles.body:
In a thrilling encounter at the Gaddafi Stadium, the Afghanistan National Cricket Team faced off against the Australian Men’s Cricket Team in a match that had fans on the edge of their seats. The match scorecard for the Afghanistan National Cricket Team vs Australian Men’s Cricket Team was a rollercoaster of emotions, with key moments that will be remembered for years to come. With live updates from afg vs aus live and detailed statistics, this clash was a true spectacle of skill and strategy.

Early in the match, Afghanistan put up a resilient fight with standout performances from players like Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Mohammad Nabi. The toss played a crucial role as afg vs aus toss determined the initial momentum. The match timeline showed Afghanistan’s steady approach against a formidable Australian line-up that featured stars such as Adam Zampa and Glenn Maxwell. Commentary by experts like Spencer Johnson and insights from azmat omarzai highlighted how every ball contributed to the unfolding drama.

As the game progressed, the ICC Champions Trophy points table was updated in real time, reflecting the impact of this encounter on the champions trophy standings and points table champions trophy 2025. Fans tracking the match via afg vs aus live score were treated to an exciting contest where Australia’s aggressive batting was met with Afghanistan’s determined bowling. Key moments included a crucial breakthrough by Sediqullah Atal and a brilliant spell by Rahmat Shah, which shifted the balance in favor of Afghanistan.

The match scorecard provided a comprehensive overview, detailing every wicket, boundary, and partnership. For those looking for a complete analysis, the afghanistan national cricket team vs australian men’s cricket team timeline and stats offered insights into factors such as the DLS method and afghanistan vs australia toss decisions. This data, along with the ICC Champions Trophy points table 2025 and group B points table updates, enabled fans to gauge whether Afghanistan could qualify for the semi final and how the champion trophy table might look moving forward.

Spectators and online audiences also had plenty of reasons to cheer as questions like ‘where to watch afghanistan national cricket team vs australian men’s cricket team’ and ‘afghanistan vs australia live’ dominated social media trends. With live commentary and match updates under tags like aus vs afg live and australia-afghanistan live match, the contest was accessible to cricket fans worldwide.

Beyond the thrilling cricket action, the match also saw discussions around broader topics such as the ICC Champions Trophy and the overall points table of champions trophy 2025. The battle between aus and afg was not just about individual brilliance; it was a tactical war where every run and wicket mattered. Analysts speculated on scenarios like how can afg qualify for semi final and what the champions trophy point table might reveal after this game.

As the final overs were bowled, the intensity peaked with both teams striving to leave their mark on the champions trophy. With scores locked in and the afghanistan national cricket team vs australian men’s cricket team standings updated, fans now look forward to the next phase of the tournament. Whether it was the brilliant innings from Mohammad Nabi, the tactical acumen of the Afghanistan coach 2025, or the timely interventions by Australia’s key bowlers, the match was a masterclass in cricket.

In summary, this match between Afghanistan and Australia was a showcase of resilience, skill, and strategic brilliance. From the live score updates and detailed match scorecard to the dynamic shifts reflected in the ICC Champions Trophy points table, every moment of the game contributed to an unforgettable cricketing experience. Fans and pundits alike will be analyzing this encounter for its rich tactical nuances and the exciting prospects it sets for upcoming fixtures, including the potential for afghanistan vs aus world cup and other high-stakes encounters in the future.
